methodology: LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Bug traced from Django ticket #36301: select_for_update(of) crashes when values_list() contains annotation expressions. Root cause in SQLCompiler.get_select() building klass_info['select_fields'] with incorrect range when Query.selected reorders columns. Fix commit: 71a19a0e475165dbc14c1fe02f552013ee670e4c.
